desc: Unique luxurious soy candles in recycled wine/champagne bottles. Handcrafted and hand-poured in Perth, WA. Wanderlust evoking, natural and authentic scent journeys inspired by heritage and travel. Eco-friendly, planet friendly, sustainable, vegan, recycled bottle candle.

layout.text: An elegant scent journey. Woody, Earthy scent notes with a hint of Mandarin makes it the perfect Winter Scent.
